content: I'll definitely check out those resources. I've had good experiences with TodayTix in the past, but it's good to know about other options. By the way, I recently attended a musical called "The Phantom of the Opera" at the Civic Center Theater on May 15th, and I was really impressed by the set design. Do you know if there are any other big musicals coming to the Civic Center Theater in the near future?
